description.p: Ibus-table is an input method framework for table-based input methods. Mostly it is used for Chinese input methods such as ZhengMa, WuBi, ErBi, CangJie, …. But some tables for other languages are available as well.
This new stable release includes these changes:

ul.li: Load .desktop file for ibus-setup-table correctly under Gnome Wayland

description.p: This new stable release includes these changes:

ul.li: Avoid running initialization code of ibus_table_location.py when using ibus-table-createdb.
Make it work on Python 3.6 (Unbreak sqlite on Python 3.6) (Resolves: rhbz#1413580).
